text: Colin Sylvia (8 November 1985 â€“ 28 October 2018) was an Australian rules footballer. He played for the Melbourne Football Club and Fremantle Football Club in the Australian Football League (AFL).(26 September 2009) "Demons re- sign Sylvia" . Sunraysia Daily. Retrieved 14 August 2010 Sylvia was born in Mildura, Victoria. Sylvia was killed in a car crash near Mildura on 28 October 2018 at the age of 32. ==References== Category:1985 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Road accident deaths Category:Australian rules footballers Category:Sportspeople from Victoria (Australia)
title: Colin Sylvia
